Name: Blixten Quest
About the game: Made by One Person :) Blixten Quest is a 3D Sidescroller action adventure game. Fight fight ! Adventure is the key! Explore, Level up, talking with people, find new places like Forest,Winter,Desert,Caves,Castle and moreee! Hack and Slash feeling, kills so many you want and use your different abilites. Switch Weapons and your class change. Use Spells,Melee and Range attacks. Find loots like, Weapons,Armors,Rings,Backs and much more ! Remember there is Common, Uncommon, Rare and Epic and maybe more? There is challange, fight Bosses, enemies (Normal and Elite). Gathering and Crafting is something you need to do. Find Stones, Woods and herbs. Other Features & Is Coming Achivement. Rift Events And more is coming!
